.NET Framework 4.6.name: DiagramExtensions

methods.name: GetClassDiagram(SDType type)
methods.summary: Creates the class diagram for the given SDType.

methods.name: GetSequenceDiagram(SDMethod method, SDRepository sdRepository)
methods.summary: Creates the sequence diagram for the given SDMethod.

params.value: The method needs the complete parsed sharpDox project.

methods.syntax: public static ISDDiagram GetSequenceDiagram(SDMethod method, SDRepository sdRepository)

methods.name: IsClassDiagramEmpty(SDType type)
methods.summary: With this method you are able to check, if the class diagram, for the given SDType, is empty.
methods.returns: True, if it is empty. False, otherwise.

methods.name: IsSequenceDiagramEmpty(SDMethod method)
methods.summary: With this method you are able to check, if the sequence diagram, for the given SDMethod, is empty.
methods.returns: True, if it is empty. False, otherwise.
